title: Pixel 3a has no data, cannot edit Data Profile username (*#*#3282#*#*)
content:
I am using Red Pocket, on the Sprint network, and have no data.  Calls and texting are fine.  The phone is brand new, unlocked.

Part of their troubleshooting steps is to access the *#*#3282#*#* menu --> Data Profile --> Username and edit the value, which is wrong according to them.  But I cannot edit it on the Pixel 3a.  

On my old phone, when I entered ##3282#, I was initially presented with an Edit/View option and then could edit anything.  What's up with the Pixel 3a?  Why can I not edit Username?
